data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Boavista get the game underway.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 4, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Ricardo Quaresma (Guimaraes) has received a yellow card from Nuno Almeida.
Cristian Devenish is on a sub for Adil Rami for Boavista.
In the minute 7, In Porto, Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez (Boavista) misses the target with a header.
Nuno Almeida awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 8, Guimaraes's Bruno Duarte misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Guimaraes close to the penalty box.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Guimaraes's Rochinha breaks free at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Boavista in Porto.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
In the minute 16, Boavista have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
In the minute 18, Boavista push forward at Estadio do Bessa XXI and Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Guimaraes defence.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
In the minute 19, Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guimaraes take a 0-1 lead thanks to Marcus Edwards.
That's a fine assist from Bruno Duarte.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Guimaraes drive upfield and Ricardo Quaresma gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Boavista defender.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 23, Free kick in a good position for Guimaraes!
Ricardo Mangas for Boavista has been booked by Nuno Almeida and receives a first yellow card.
In Porto Guimaraes attack through Marcus Edwards. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 24, Boavista have a goal kick.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Nuno Almeida awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Boavista have a dangerous throw-in.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Nuno Almeida awards Boavista a goal kick.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 30, Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Important block from the Guimaraes defence as Nuno Valente Santos fires in a strike for Boavista.
In the minute 32, Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Boavista's Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 34, Bruno Duarte of Guimaraes is pulled up for offside.
Free kick Guimaraes.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
In the minute 37, Boavista needs to be cautious. Guimaraes have an attacking throw-in.
In Porto Guimaraes's Ricardo Quaresma is caught offside.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Boavista.
Nuno Almeida signals a Boavista throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
In the minute 39, Paulinho for Boavista gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Boavista's Gustavo Sauer has been booked in Porto.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Boavista.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Free kick Boavista.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Nuno Almeida will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has commenced. Guimaraes with the kick-off.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Boavista.
Nuno Almeida awards Boavista a goal kick.
Nuno Almeida signals a Boavista throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
In the minute 50, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Guimaraes are pushing forward but Rochinha's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 51, Boavista have a goal kick.
Nuno Almeida awards the home team a throw-in.
Paulinho (Boavista) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Boavista.
Boavista's Paulinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Guimaraes defender.
In the minute 56, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Boavista.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Marcus Edwards with Pepelu.
Throw-in Boavista.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In the minute 60, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Guimaraes close to the penalty box.
Bruno Duarte (Guimaraes) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
In the minute 62, Jorge Fernandes (Guimaraes) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Javi Garcia (Boavista) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 64, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez (Boavista) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 67, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Boavista are coming forward and Show gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
In the minute 67, Nuno Almeida awards Boavista a goal kick.
Yanis Hamache is replacing Ricardo Mangas for the home team.
Boavista make their third substitution with Musa Juwara replacing Show.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Boavista.
Throw-in Boavista.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 71, Chidozie Awaziem (Boavista) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Boavista surge into the attack at Estadio do Bessa XXI but Chidozie Awaziemâ€™s header is off-target.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Guimaraes's Mikel Agu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Boavista.
Guimaraes make their second substitution with Noah Jean Holm replacing Bruno Duarte.
Nicolas Janvier is replacing Andre Andre for the away team.
In the minute 75, Free kick Guimaraes.
Nuno Almeida signals a throw-in for Guimaraes, close to Boavista's area.
Chidozie Awaziem (Boavista) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Boavista's half.
Chidozie Awaziem (Boavista) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Boavista have a goal kick.
The home team replace Cristian Devenish with Miguel Reisinho.
In the minute 82, Nuno Valente Santos for Boavista gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nuno Almeida awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Gustavo Sauer with Alberth Elis. This is the fifth substitution made today by Vasco Seabra.
In Porto, Musa Juwara of Boavista is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 84, Yanis Hamache gets his shot on target but fails to score for Boavista.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Abou Ouattara is replacing Ricardo Quaresma for the away team.
In the minute 89, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
At Estadio do Bessa XXI the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Guimaraes will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Boavista.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
Can Boavista capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guimaraes's half?
Corner awarded to Boavista.
In Porto, Miguel Reisinho (Boavista) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
That's full-time at Estadio do Bessa XXI. The final score is 0-1.
